mapper.select:
SELECT nat.* FROM rfid_mk_nation nat WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY nat.natn_level, nat.sort_num asc
SELECT count(*) FROM rfid_mk_nation nat WHERE 1=1

SELECT T1.natn_seq AS natn_seq01 , T2.natn_seq AS natn_seq02 , T3.natn_seq AS natn_seq03 , T4.natn_seq AS natn_seq04 , T5.natn_seq AS natn_seq05 , T6.natn_seq AS natn_seq06 , T7.natn_seq AS natn_seq07 , T8.natn_seq AS natn_seq08 FROM rfid_mk_nation T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_mk_nation T2 ON T1.parent_natn_seq = T2.natn_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_mk_nation T3 ON T2.parent_natn_seq = T3.natn_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_mk_nation T4 ON T3.parent_natn_seq = T4.natn_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_mk_nation T5 ON T4.parent_natn_seq = T5.natn_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_mk_nation T6 ON T5.parent_natn_seq = T6.natn_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_mk_nation T7 ON T6.parent_natn_seq = T7.natn_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_mk_nation T8 ON T7.parent_natn_seq = T8.natn_seq WHERE T1.use_yn = 'Y'
AND ( T1.natn_cd LIKE concat('%', #searchKeyword# ,'%') OR T1.natn_name LIKE concat('%', #searchKeyword# ,'%') OR T1.remark LIKE concat('%', #searchKeyword# ,'%') )
AND 1 = 2

SELECT nat.* ,T2.natn_name as parent_natn_name ,FN_GET_CMMNCODENAME('COM002', nat.use_yn) AS use_yn_str FROM rfid_mk_nation nat LEFT OUTER JOIN rfid_mk_nation T2 ON nat.parent_natn_seq = T2.natn_seq WHERE nat.NATN_SEQ = #{natnSeq}
